snippet.title: Sonic Utopia Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Sonic Utopia is an experiment that not only tries to expand on Sonic gameplay in an intuitive way in 3D, but also aims to capture the best of Sonic's style and tie it together in a cohesive experience. Nearly everything in this demo, from art to sound to the gameplay engine, was made from scratch.

I created all of the models, animation, and most of the textures and sound, as well as the music.

The 3D Sonic engine and the gameplay driving this vision was created by my programmer fellow Murasaki.

We've been working together on this for a while and we're glad to finally share it, with a debut at SAGE 2016.

The game is still in a very raw state, but you can try it for yourself here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cvxPN5MU9BJKAruY4gJ4cNu3DxYIc99L/view

The music is also available here:
https://soundcloud.com/mr-lange/panic-in-paradise


Credits:
Mr Lange (myself) - Art, Animation, Sound and Music, Game Design
https://twitter.com/GreatLange

Murasaki Fox - Engine and Gameplay Programming
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP1VPW10KKSoFBx6bsN64qg
https://twitter.com/MurasakiKemono

Tpot - Additional Programming
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnNMk7bdI_AgZb8mOjdBH0A

PicsAndPixels - Additional Artwork
http://picsandpixels.deviantart.com/
